en.title: FusionExcel Sponsors Pahang Wheelchair Basketball Team!
en.content:
FusionExcel is proud to sponsor the Pahang Wheelchair Basketball Team in the Wheelchair Basketball National League Competition. The mockup cheque of RM 6,000 was presented by FusionExcel Founder CEO Paul Ting and Founder Director KS Lee to the team's manager Chong Tuck Meng, who is also the Founder of Perwira K9. FusionExcel wishes the team great success in the competition!

Note: Mr Chong, in his speech, was proud to announce that the Perwira K9 Wheelchair Basketball Junior Team sponsored by FusionExcel recently qualified for the World Wheelchair Basketball Competition in France this year! Congratulations!
